DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with wet AMD, dry AMD, and age-matched controls will undergo routine occular measurements, will provide a blood and cheek cell sample, and will have macular pigment optical density (MPOD) measured to determine if there is an association between genetics, MPOD and the risk of progression to wet AMD.
DOC.brief_title: Association of Macular Pigment Optical Density (MPOD) and Genetic Variants in Complement Factor H in Subjects With Choroidal Neovascular (CNV)
DOC.criteria: subject is diagnosed with either CNV, dry AMD or is an agematched control self reported as nonHispanic Caucasian 60 years of age or older provides signed and dated informed consent agrees to provide 10 mL of whole blood and two buccal swabs previous donation under this protocol
